prefs.label: Gesture Detection
prefs.help: Swipe- Trigger gestures after releasing the finger during a high-velocity swipe. Slide - Trigger gestures on finger move of 15px instead of on finger release. Fluid - Gestures track the user's finger for a more fluid user experience.

prefs.label: Enable Side Bezel Gestures
prefs.help: Enable/Disable gestures from the left/right bezels.
